name: Zofus Advokat & Konsulentfirma
goal: Lobbying towards EU-institutions mainly in relation to initiatives and legislation regarding food and environment.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumers, Environment, Food Safety, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Danish representative of the following organisations:
BatteriForeningen - Danish branch of European Portable Battery Association EPBA
Margarine Foreningen - Danish Margarine Association Plantebranchen - Danish Plant-based Foods Organisation
-
Initiatives related to EU food and environment (Waste) legislation.
Of special actual interest the initiatives around
new regulation of trans fatty acids, the upcoming revision of the batteries directive, circular economy and sustainable plant based foods
